title: Whirlwind
description: “I let her down…What if I do it again?” Alex.“Consumed by the memory of past wrongs. It is like he isn’t even seeing me…I should’ve been honest before it got out of hand,” Linda.Nothing stays in Vegas. Their simmering attraction certainly did follow them back to London. After their friends get married, Linda and Alex decide to no longer deny the crazy attraction between them and let it take its course even though they’ve got issues. It’s a whirlwind affair that soon comes to a halt when something unexpected happens. Their trust and new relationship are soon put to test. Will they overcome their issues and give in to love or will their whirlwind affair be their last?
author: Joan A.
